verses.text: Then \w came|strong="H0935"\w* all the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w* unto \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, and \w spake|strong="H0559"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, we \add are\add* thy \w bone|strong="H6106"\w* and thy \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*.

Also in time \w past|strong="H0865"\w*, when \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* was \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over us, thou wast he that leddest \w out|strong="H3318"\w* and broughtest \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to thee, Thou shalt \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and thou shalt be a \w captain|strong="H5057"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

So all the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* to \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*; and \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* a \w league|strong="H1285"\w* with them in \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and they \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \add was\add* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, \add and\add* he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

In \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w* he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* over \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w months|strong="H2320"\w*: and in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* over all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

¶ And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* and his \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* unto the \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w*, the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: which \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Except thou take \w away|strong="H5493"\w* the \w blind|strong="H5787"\w* and the \w lame|strong="H6455"\w*, thou shalt not come \w in|strong="H0935"\w* hither: \w thinking|strong="H0559"\w*, \w David|strong="H1732"\w* cannot come \w in|strong="H0935"\w* hither.\f + \fr 5.6 \ft thinking…: or, saying David shall not, etc\f*

Nevertheless \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w took|strong="H3920"\w* the strong \w hold|strong="H4686"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*: the same \add is\add* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* on that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, Whosoever getteth \w up|strong="H5060"\w* to the \w gutter|strong="H6794"\w*, and \w smiteth|strong="H5221"\w* the \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w*, and the \w lame|strong="H6455"\w* and the \w blind|strong="H5787"\w*, \add that are\add* \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* of \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, \add he shall be chief and captain\add*. Wherefore they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w blind|strong="H5787"\w* and the \w lame|strong="H6455"\w* shall not \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 5.8 \ft Wherefore…: or, Because they had said, even the blind and the lame, He shall not\f*

So \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w fort|strong="H4686"\w*, and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* it the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* from \w Millo|strong="H4407"\w* and \w inward|strong="H1004"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w on|strong="H1980"\w*, and grew \w great|strong="H1419"\w*, and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \add was\add* with him.\f + \fr 5.10 \ft went…: Heb. went, going and growing\f*

¶ And \w Hiram|strong="H2438"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*, and \w carpenters|strong="H2796"\w*, and \w masons|strong="H7023"\w*: and they \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* an \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 5.11 \ft masons: Heb. hewers of the stone of the wall\f*

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w perceived|strong="H3045"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w established|strong="H3559"\w* him \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and that he had \w exalted|strong="H5375"\w* his \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* for his \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel’s|strong="H3478"\w* sake.

¶ And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \add him\add* more \w concubines|strong="H6370"\w* and \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* out of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* he was \w come|strong="H0935"\w* from \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*: and there were yet \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

And these \add be\add* the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of those that were \w born|strong="H3209"\w* unto him in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; \w Shammua|strong="H8051"\w*, and \w Shobab|strong="H7727"\w*, and \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w*, and \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*,
\w Ibhar|strong="H2984"\w* also, and \w Elishua|strong="H0474"\w*, and \w Nepheg|strong="H5298"\w*, and \w Japhia|strong="H3309"\w*,
And \w Elishama|strong="H0476"\w*, and \w Eliada|strong="H0450"\w*, and \w Eliphalet|strong="H0467"\w*.

¶ But when the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that they had \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, all the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*; and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add of it\add*, and went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w hold|strong="H4686"\w*.
The \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* also \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w spread|strong="H5203"\w* themselves in the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of \w Rephaim|strong="H7497"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w enquired|strong="H7592"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Shall I go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*? wilt thou \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* them into mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*? And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, Go \w up|strong="H5927"\w*: for I will \w doubtless|strong="H5414"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* into thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Baal-perazim|strong="H1188"\w*, and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* them there, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath broken \w forth|strong="H6555"\w* upon mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me, as the \w breach|strong="H6556"\w* of \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*. Therefore he \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of that \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w Baal-perazim|strong="H1188"\w*.\f + \fr 5.20 \ft Baal-perazim: that is, the plain of breaches\f*

And there they \w left|strong="H5800"\w* their \w images|strong="H6091"\w*, and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and his \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w burned|strong="H5375"\w* them.\f + \fr 5.21 \ft burned…: or, took them away\f*

¶ And the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* yet \w again|strong="H3254"\w*, and \w spread|strong="H5203"\w* themselves in the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of \w Rephaim|strong="H7497"\w*.

And when \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w enquired|strong="H7592"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou shalt not go \w up|strong="H5927"\w*; \add but\add* fetch a \w compass|strong="H5437"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* them, and \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon them over \w against|strong="H4136"\w* the mulberry \w trees|strong="H1057"\w*.

And let it be, when thou \w hearest|strong="H8085"\w* the \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* of a \w going|strong="H6807"\w* in the \w tops|strong="H7218"\w* of the mulberry \w trees|strong="H1057"\w*, that then thou shalt \w bestir|strong="H2782"\w* thyself: for then shall the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, to \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* did \w so|strong="H6213"\w*, as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* him; and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* from \w Geba|strong="H1387"\w* until thou \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Gazer|strong="H1507"\w*.\f + \fr 5.25 \ft Geba: also called, Gibeon\f*
